a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Average score for 8th graders on the TIMSS mathematics assessment of
TIMSS: Mean performance on the mathematics scale for eighth grade students, male
TIMSS: Mean performance on the mathematics scale for eighth grade
Source: International Association for the Evaluation of Educational Achievement (IEA)'s Trends in International Mathematics and Science Study
